module.name: skeletonViewer
module.description: This module is responsible for displaying in real-time multiple skeletons in 3D.
module.copypolicy: Released under the terms of the BSD 3-Clause License.
module.description-long: This module is responsible for displaying in real-time multiple skeletons in 3D. It makes use of VTK.

param.desc: Viewer's x position in screen coordinates pixels.
Viewer's y position in screen coordinates pixels.
Viewer's width in screen coordinates pixels.
Viewer's height in screen coordinates pixels.
Viewer's background color using rgb color specification.

input.description: Receives the following commands and provides replies: (notation: "." identifies a string) -# set camera options "set_camera" ("position" pos_list) ("focalpoint" focal_list) ("viewup" view_list):set camera options for visualization. pos_list the position of the camera in world coordinates (set to (0.0,0.0,1.0) if not provided). focal_list the focal point of the camera in world coordinates (set to (0.0,0.0,0.0) if not provided). view_list view up direction for the camera (set to (0.0,1.0,0.0) if not provided).
